title: [GATE] Smoke Test Gate
intent: Ensure all basic functionality works before allowing new features

verifiers.name: All unit tests pass
verifiers.command: $result = Invoke-Pester -Path '..	ests\TaskManager.Tests.ps1' -PassThru; if ($result.FailedCount -eq 0) { exit 0 } else { exit 1 }

verifiers.name: No PSScriptAnalyzer warnings
verifiers.command: $issues = Invoke-ScriptAnalyzer -Path '..\TaskManager.psm1' -Severity Warning; if ($issues.Count -eq 0) { exit 0 } else { exit 1 }
